UPDATE tr_agency
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
city_code = #{cityCode},
sex = #{sex},
mobile = #{mobile},
id_card = #{idCard},
bank_number = #{bankNumber},
bank_type = #{bankType},
idcard_front = #{idcardFront},
idcard_back = #{idcardBack},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
create_date = #{createDate},
create_name = #{createName},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
modify_name = #{modifyName},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
assign_city = #{assignCity},
WHERE id = #{id}
